ai-kv16.9:0.4_0: Then talk about forms of the formless realms,
ai-kv16.9:1.1_0: There is form in the form realm.
ai-kv16.9:1.3_0: a blissful meditation in the present life belonging to the higher mind, which belongs to the same Buddhist sect and is a happy life with a mind reinforced with the same mind as its object.
ai-kv16.9:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv16.9:1.5_0: Doesn’t necessary condition for rebirth in the present life or in a happy life, or even a single rebirth in the present life or in lives to come? It does not go in one vicinity or Cittagutta . Instead of sitting together with a single meditation subject, one meditates together with a single meditation subject as its object.
ai-kv16.9:1.7_0: trying to avoid sitting in a blissful meditation in the present life. ...
ai-kv16.9:1.9_0: “There is form, like the formless realm.”
ai-kv16.9:2.1_0: There is formless in the formless realm.
ai-kv16.9:2.3_0: a blissful meditation in the present life belonging to the higher mind, which belongs to the same Buddhist sect and is a happy life with a mind reinforced with the same mind as its object.
ai-kv16.9:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv16.9:2.5_0: Doesn’t abide in blissful meditation in the present life or in lives to come? ...
ai-kv16.9:2.8_0: If he has not attained a bowl made of anything, nor is there a place where there is no rebirth.
ai-kv16.9:2.9_0: one object, Revata is to be corrected on one side.
ai-kv16.9:3.2_0: “There is form, there is the formless realm.”
ai-kv16.9:3.4_0: having done good deeds in the sensual realms that are (sense-spheres) done with (wholesome) deeds,
ai-kv16.9:3.6_0: (There is) because of the sensuous (good) conduct and sensual pleasures, he subduedly about sense pleasures,
ai-kv16.9:3.7_0: “In the formless realm, rising above ground, because of deeds in the formless realm, the opposite sex,
ai-kv16.9:3.8_0: The discussion of form and form is finished.
